tgt_original: parṣanmadhye vicitrāṃ prathayati mahatīṃ dhīmatāṃ prītihetoḥ
buddhānāṃ sarvalokaprasṛtamaviratoddhārasaddharmaghoṣaṃ  vande saṃbhogakāyaṃ tamahamihamahādharmarājyapratiṣṭham || iti || 3 ||  nirmāṇakāyaśarīrāṇāṃ yadā bhavati sādhakaḥ |
saṃbodhau dharmacakre kvacidapi ca punardṛśyate yaḥ praśāntaḥ |
naivābhāvo na bhāvaḥ khamiva samaraso durvibhāvasvabhāvaḥ |

vande pratyatmavedyaṃ tamahamanupamaṃ dharmakāyaṃ jinānām || iti || 2 ||  saṃbhogakāyaśarīrāṇāṃ yadā bhavati sādhakaḥ |  [ tadā samāhitānāṃ ca ] saṃbhogaṃ pravadāmyaham || 3 ||  saṃbhogamāha - sambhogetyādi |
